mapper.select: SELECT spur.USER_ROLE_ID, spur.MGR_ID, spur.ROLE_ID, spur.STATUS, spur.REMARK, spur.UPDATED_DT, spur.UPDATED_BY, spur.CREATED_DT, spur.CREATED_BY, spur.IS_DELETED, spur.VERSION, (SELECT SPR.ROLE_NAME FROM STBL_PRI_ROLE SPR WHERE SPR.ROLE_ID = spur.ROLE_ID) ROLE_NAME FROM STBL_PRI_USER_ROLE spur WHERE spur.MGR_ID = #{mgrId} AND ROWNUM = 1 AND spur.IS_DELETED = 'N'

SELECT MENU_ID, parent_id, menu_code, menu_name, description, menu_link, is_leaf, menu_level, menu_ord, status, remark, updated_dt, updated_by, created_dt, created_by, is_deleted, version, optype FROM stbl_pri_menue WHERE is_deleted = 'N' START WITH parent_id = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR menu_id = parent_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY menu_ord

SELECT spm.MENU_ID, spm.MENU_NAME, spm.MENU_CODE, spmo.MENU_OPT_ID, spo.OPT_CODE, spo.STATUS OPT_STATUS, spo.OPT_ORDER, spo.DESCRIPTION, spo.OPT_NAME, spo.OPT_ID, spro.ROLE_OPT_ID FROM STBL_PRI_USER_ROLE spur, STBL_PRI_ROLE_OPT spro, STBL_PRI_MENU_OPT spmo, STBL_PRI_MENUE spm, STBL_PRI_OPT spo WHERE SPUR.MGR_ID = #{mgrId} AND SPUR.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND SPRO.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND SPMO.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND SPM.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND SPO.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND SPUR.ROLE_ID = SPRO.ROLE_ID AND SPRO.MENU_OPT_ID = SPMO.MENU_OPT_ID AND SPMO.OPT_ID = SPO.OPT_ID AND SPMO.MENU_ID = SPM.MENU_ID

select id id, name name, code code, phone phone , active_flag activeFlag, is_manager manager,passWord passWord, e_mail email,descrition descrition from ods_s_user t where 1=1
and t.code like concat('%',#{USER_CODE},'%')
and t.name like concat('%',#{MGR_NAME},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into ods_s_user(name, code, phone, active_flag, is_manager, password, e_mail, descrition) values ( #{name}, #{code}, #{phone}, '1', '0', #{passWord}, #{email}, #{descrition} )
